nodes.excerpt: Not everyone has fast internet. If your page loads very slowly, your users will have less time to browse your site and your bounce rate will increase. This causes you to lose your customers.
nodes.title: Screpy 2.0 - All-In-One SEO and website analysis tool
nodes.author: Mustafa Aydemir

localize.description: 并不是每个人都有快速的互联网。如果您的页面加载非常慢，您的用户浏览您的站点的时间将会减少，而您的跳出率将会增加。这会导致您失去客户。
localize.tagline: 一体式SEO和网站分析工具

localize.description: 並不是每個人都有快速的互聯網。如果您的頁面加載非常慢，您的用戶瀏覽您的站點的時間將會減少，而您的跳出率將會增加。這會導致您失去客戶。
localize.tagline: 一體式SEO和網站分析工具

nodes.excerpt: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
nodes.title: Base64.ai - Extract text, data, photos and more from all types of docs
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Base64.ai是一种云API，可以从所有类型的文档中提取数据、照片和签名。我们预建了ID、驾照、护照、签证、发票和更多文档类型的模型。集成只是一次API调用。
localize.tagline: 从所有类型的文档中提取文本、数据、照片等

localize.description: Base64.ai是一種雲API，可以從所有類型的文檔中提取數據、照片和簽名。我們預建了ID、駕照、護照、簽證、發票和更多文檔類型的模型。集成只是一次API調用。
localize.tagline: 從所有類型的文檔中提取文本、數據、照片等

nodes.excerpt: Tails is the ultimate TailwindCSS Page Creator. Need a website for your next great idea? Tails is the perfect tool to creating a beautiful landing page. Over 120 design blocks you can mix and match to craft the perfect landing page for your next project.

localize.description: Tails是终极TailwinCSS页面创建器。需要一个网站来展示你的下一个好点子吗？Tails是创建漂亮登录页面的完美工具。超过120个设计模块，您可以混合搭配，为您的下一个项目制作完美的登录页。
localize.tagline: 终极TailwinCSS拖放页面创建器

localize.tagline: 終極TailwinCSS拖放頁面創建器

nodes.excerpt: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
nodes.title: Haystack - Ship faster and improve dev happiness
nodes.author: Gustaf Alströmer

localize.description: 借助由您的Github数据提供支持的工程分析，加快发货速度并提高团队满意度。--→可视化整个交付过程，从提交到部署，→突出瓶颈(如代码审查)，→发现问题(如功能延迟和团队倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快发货速度，提高开发人员幸福感

localize.description: 藉助由您的Github數據提供支持的工程分析，加快發貨速度並提高團隊滿意度。--→可視化整個交付過程，從提交到部署，→突出瓶頸(如代碼審查)，→發現問題(如功能延遲和團隊倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快發貨速度，提高開發人員幸福感

nodes.excerpt: Metrics generates infographics about you so you can embed them on your GitHub profile to let other users know more about you. Display your git stats along with an isometric calendar, favorites music, website performances, last tweets, projects, languages,..

nodes.excerpt: Sizey is a MacOS app that helps you calculate aspect ratios! ⠀ — ⠀ ⚡️ Add Custom Aspect Ratios ⠀ 💥 Round to the nearest whole # ⠀ ➡️ Keyboard Shortcuts ⠀ 📐 Scale & Densities (@1x, @2x, @3x) ⠀ 🙌 Landscape & Portrait modes — ⠀ You design. We’ll math. ❤️📐
nodes.title: Sizey: Aspect Ratio Calculator - Instantly calculate any aspect ratio.
nodes.author: Meritt Thomas

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS应用程序，可以帮助您计算纵横比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定义纵横比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整数#⠀➡️键盘快捷键⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌横向和纵向模式-您设计的⠀。我们要学数学。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即时计算任何纵横比。

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS應用程序，可以幫助您計算縱橫比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定義縱橫比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整數#⠀➡️鍵盤快捷鍵⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌橫向和縱向模式-您設計的⠀。我們要學數學。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即時計算任何縱橫比。

nodes.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
nodes.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email
nodes.author: Argyrou Argyris

localize.description: 当你阅读一封电子邮件时，你会在主题下方看到一个数字分数-一个介于0到100之间的分数。分数100表示电子邮件非常容易阅读，分数0表示电子邮件很难阅读。
localize.tagline: 计算电子邮件的可读性分数

localize.description: 當你閱讀一封電子郵件時，你會在主題下方看到一個數字分數-一個介於0到100之間的分數。分數100表示電子郵件非常容易閱讀，分數0表示電子郵件很難閱讀。
localize.tagline: 計算電子郵件的可讀性分數

nodes.excerpt: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.
nodes.title: ZenML - Create reproducible machine learning pipelines
nodes.author: David Aronchick

localize.description: 有没有花了几个小时训练ML模型，结果却让它们在生产中崩溃和烧毁？ZenML在这里提供帮助。跟踪元数据、比较结果并扩展到云。它是开源的、可扩展的，并且与现成的久经考验的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 创建可重现的机器学习管道

localize.description: 有沒有花了幾個小時訓練ML模型，結果卻讓它們在生產中崩潰和燒燬？ZenML在這裏提供幫助。跟蹤元數據、比較結果並擴展到雲。它是開源的、可擴展的，並且與現成的久經考驗的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 創建可重現的機器學習管道

nodes.excerpt: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.
nodes.title: Meteostat - Historical weather and climate data
nodes.author: Christian Lamprecht

localize.description: 气象站是一个气象数据库，提供全球数千个气象站和地点的历史天气和气候数据。该项目的特点是为开发人员提供了方便的Web应用程序和数据接口。
localize.tagline: 历史天气和气候数据

localize.description: 氣象站是一個氣象數據庫，提供全球數千個氣象站和地點的歷史天氣和氣候數據。該項目的特點是爲開發人員提供了方便的Web應用程序和數據接口。
localize.tagline: 歷史天氣和氣候數據
